title: Vietnam : number of social network users 2017 to 2023
summary: In general Number of users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Number of users in millions, about 50.9 was reported at Year 2021
Minimum Number of users in millions about 46.2 was reached at Year 2018
